comment: Dr. Heckert's INED class was absolutely horrendous.  As a future educator, I am ashamed that Kennesaw State would allow a course like this.  The course was a never-ending list of ridiculously hard assignments with no "teaching" involved at all. No online lectures, no useful resources. Very hypocritical in a course on differentiated instruction.

Take her! Dr. Heckert is so wonderful! Her online class was daunting at first but after a week or 2, it becomes clearer. A lot of work, nothing too difficult, just make sure you keep up and it won't seem so bad. She gives GREAT info and resources I will definitely use in my classroom. She also really reads your work and gives thoughtful feedback.
Absolutely amazing professor. She gives timely feedback and is passionate about education. Dr. Heckert is a wealth of knowledge and taking her class will only fuel your own fire for education.

I have taken tons of online courses at several colleges and this was the best so far. Dr. Heckert is phenomenal!The summer semester is intense with lots of assignments but as long as you keep up with the work & readings you will do great.Loved the info too, learned way more than I ever expected.Very eye opening course.She gives timely feedback!

I took the class online, but it was so much better than expected. I was extremely nervous to start with because I had never taken any class online. Dr. Heckert really made the class interactive. a LOT of assignments but easy as long as you keep up with them and the readings. The textbook is used for lots of reading and an occasional assignment.

I took this course online and it seemed like it was actually in a classroom because Dr. Heckert is just that interactive. A lot of written assignments, discussion board posts, but all important and interesting. Book isn't used much, but still needed for some assignments. If you get the opportunity, take her. She's so nice and helpful!

I took this online and it was great.  Dr. Heckert gave many writing assignments, but they were very helpful to the content of the class.  Used the textbook very little..mostly online resources.  Lots of discussions to post online and had to do volunteer work.  Overall, great class.  Learned a lot and got an A.

Dr. Heckert is one of the most knowledgeable and kind professors that I have ever had. She answers all questions in the most wise and diplomatic way possible. (and there were some off the wall comments) She could teach anywhere and anyone and have happy students. I can?t wait to take another class with her. My favorite by far.

An absolute sweetheart! Willing to extend deadlines to meet your needs as long as you communicate with her. Sign in sheet at the door to monitor attendance, and most tests were take-home including the final. Required book for a few in class assignments, and cancelled class several times throughout the semester (with out of class assignments).
I loved her! She was extremely nice and helpful, and her class was not difficult at all. If you ever have a chance to take her, do it :)
The best teacher EVER! If you have any opportunity to take her, do. She is the most laid back, fantastic professor ever.
GREAT teacher! She is very nice, understanding, and encouraging.

Love Dr. Heckert! She is a dedicated professional who teaches using various strategies, which makes it more interesting! She has many impressive years under her belt as an educator, specializing in teaching students who have various disabilities. She is very clear and informative about what she expects and liberal at the same time.Very understandin
AWESOME teacher. Very friendly, genuinely loves her profession. Reaches out to students and makes the semester fun! Lots of group work and in class stuff.

It's hard not to get a little boring when the class is 2 hours and 45 minutes long, but she uses her time wisely. Her tests are very easy and if you pay attention to her ppt lectures or read the text, you'll do fine. Our class always had open note tests. She also leaves feedback on your essays which is usually very helpful. She was my favorite.

She is AMAZING! She could get a little boring during lecture but she knows how to balance work loads. Lots of group work, easy lecture, easy assignments. Although her class is easy she expects you to work and come to her if you do not understand. Take her!
Excellent teacher!! Very understanding, seriously take her! She is friendly and very helpful...one of my favorite teachers at Kennesaw!
